function.name: create_credit_dispute
function.description: Create a new credit dispute for a beneficiary. Used to track disputes filed with credit bureaus on behalf of beneficiaries. Returns the created dispute object.

beneficiary_id.description: UUID of the beneficiary this dispute is for (required)

creditor_name.description: Name of the creditor/company being disputed (required, max 200 characters)

account_number.description: Account number associated with the dispute (optional)

status.description: Current status of the dispute (optional, default: pending)

date_submitted.description: Date the dispute was submitted in ISO 8601 format (optional)

returns.description: The created credit dispute object with id and timestamps
